name: Starboard 0.0.0.1 - Building Demo
description:
Q to switch to build mode. X to cancel building.

Press 1 to cycle through floors, 2 to cycle through walls, 3 for pillars, and 4 for wall attachments.

Extract the folder to somewhere then just run the exe to play.

This is the first demo released for my game Starboard, made to showcase the building system. Nothing is final, and bugs are plenty. I realize there are still a lot of problems with it, and it will of course be improved in future versions.

Feel free to let me know of any suggestions you have :)
